full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL LDAN LHA MO'I BAm SKONGS KYI CHO GA NYES PA KUN SEL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008B (ZHES DPAL LDAN LHA MO 'DOD @009A *, ,KHAMS DBANG PHYUG MA'I THUGS DAM BSKANGS PA DANG, 'GA' RKYEN GYI 'TSUB LHONG SOGS ZHI NGAL MCHOG TU BSNGAGS PA, SROG CHAGS RGYU SKONGS DANG, BAm SKONGS KYI CHO GA NYES PA KUN SEL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SPYIR YANG SNYIGS MAR SPYOD PA'I DBANG GIS MA MO MKHA' 'GRO 'KHYAGS PA'I 'TSUB LHONGS GYIS BSKYED PA'I NAD GDON SHIN TU MANG BA DANG, LHAG PAR LA SNGA PHYIR NYE BSKOR DU NAD RIMS RIGS MI 'DRA BA MANG DU CHED CING, MI SHES PA'I LTAS MTSAN SNA TSOGS BYUNG BA, BSRUNG MA'I KHU LDOG GI RNAM PA YIN PA DANG, BSKANGS BSHAGS MANG DU BTANG NA LEGS PA'I MTSAN MA KUN RTOGS KYI RI MOR SHAR PA BZHIN, LAG LEN DU BSTAR SKABS, BTZUN GZUGS DHARMA BADZRA GYIS BAm SKONGS KYI CHO GA LHO BRAG GRUB CHEN LAS KYI RDO RJE'I GSUNG LA TSIGS PHRAD CUNG ZAD BSGYUR CING, LAG LEN GSAL BAR BGYIS TE, ,DBEN GNAS BDE CHEN CHOS GLING DU KLAG CHOG CHU 'BABS SU BKOD PA 'DIS KYANG MI MTHUN NYER 'TSE THAMS CAD ZHI ZHING, 'DOD KHAMS DBANG MO DGYES PAS 'PHRIN LAS RNAM BZHI LHUN GYIS GRUB PAR GYUR CIG ,'DI GNYAN BAS, @009B GAR THOD THOD DU BYA MI RUNG GSUNG BAS SNOD MIN LA GSANG SHING SKABS SHES PAR BYA'O,, ` SVASTI, ,,TSUL 'DI DGE SLONG THABS MKHAS RGYA MTSO YIS, ,CHOS SDE BDE CHEN LHUN GRUB GLING MCHOG TU, ,RGYU RKYEN SBYAR TE DPAR DU BZHENGS PA'I DGES, ,'GRO KUN BLA MED BYANG CHEN MYUR THOB SHOG ,CES SH'A SA DHA RAS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA DZA YANTU,, ,,)
